assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Ai Holdings Corporation provides security and peripheral computer equipment, measuring devices, and card and other office equipment. The company offers security system equipment, including surveillance cameras and recorders for banks, governmental facilities, shopping districts, retail shops, condominiums, and other facilities; card issuing systems for medical institutions and general purposes, such as magnetic card readers, ID cards, and cards with embedded IC chips; CAD software for steel structures; cutting plotters and label processing systems; and measurement devices for clients that comprise automakers, electrical appliance manufacturers, and university research institutes. It also engages in the earthquake-resistance inspection and seismic design activities; designing of various buildings, including governmental offices, cultural facilities, schools, and industrial plants; IoT promotion business, such as IoT, high-speed communication, digital transformation, and AI-based automation; and decarbonization system business. In addition, the company is involved in the development, manufacture and sale of automatic wet hand towel dispensers, frozen food and confection products, other software and networking products, and metal detectors, as well as precision parts comprising insert nuts, spacers, screws, connectors, etc.; consulting and worker dispatch businesses; leasing and installation of office equipment, OA equipment, etc.; golf course management and engineering activities; buying and selling of new and used equipment for semiconductor manufacturing and inspection equipment, consumables sales, and start-ups; sale of security systems and mailing system equipment; and provision of maintenance services. Ai Holdings Corporation was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
